name.jp: サファイア・ティーガー

description.en: A Blue Armored Tigar from the grassy plains of Corl Island that follows its master around picking up dropped items.
description.ar: A Blue Armored Tigar from the grassy plains of Corl Island that follows its master around picking up dropped items.
description.br: Um Tigar das planícies da Ilha Coral domesticado que segue seu mestre e recolhe os itens que caem.
description.cns: 一只来自珊瑚岛大草原的蓝色装甲虎跟随它的主人并捡起周围掉落的物品。
description.de: Ein flauschiger, aber dennoch gefährlicher Tiergefährte, der für dich Gegenstände aufsammelt.
description.fi: A Blue Armored Tigar from the grassy plains of Corl Island that follows its master around picking up dropped items.
description.fil: A Blue Armored Tigar from the grassy plains of Corl Island that follows its master around picking up dropped items.
description.fr: invoque un bébé Taiga qui suit son maître et ramasse les objets laissés par les ennemis
description.id: Seekor Blue Armored Tigar dari dataran berumput di Coral Island yang mengikuti tuannya berkeliling mengambil barang-barang drop.
description.it: A Blue Armored Tigar from the grassy plains of Corl Island that follows its master around picking up dropped items.
description.jp: サファイア・ティーガーを召喚・帰還させることができます。
description.kr: 타이가를 소환하거나 해제합니다. 소환 하였을 시, 주변에 있는 아이템을 자동 습득하게 됩니다.
description.nl: A Blue Armored Tigar from the grassy plains of Corl Island that follows its master around picking up dropped items.
description.pl: A Blue Armored Tigar from the grassy plains of Corl Island that follows its master around picking up dropped items.
description.ru: Тигра в синей броне с Кораллового острова. Послушно семенит за хозяином и подбирает предметы.
description.sp: Un Tigar Acorazado Azul de las llanuras de hierba de la Isla Coral que sigue a su dueño y recoge los objetos soltados.
description.sw: A Blue Armored Tigar from the grassy plains of Corl Island that follows its master around picking up dropped items.
description.th: Blue Armored Tigarที่ติดตามเจ้าของไปรอบๆ และหยิบของที่หล่นลงมา
description.tw: 召喚或解除泰格虎(藍). 召喚時, 將會自動撿取周邊道具.
description.vi: Một con Hổ mang giáp xanh từ vùng đồng bằng cỏ của Đảo Corl đi theo chủ nhân của nó để nhặt những món đồ bị đánh rơi.
